【歷史回望】

高普上一次領軍出席歐聯四強，係 2012-13 球季，當時又係首回合主場，又係大勝，又係有失波！

當年，利雲道夫斯基入四球，令多蒙特首回合大勝皇家馬德里 4-1，次回合皇家馬德里主場勝 2-0，總比數 4-3，多蒙特驚險晉級（失多一球都出局呀）！

【高普：認真對待未來兩戰】

高普承認次回合將是一場艱辛之戰，無論是何賽果羅馬也會拼命反擊。

「我們在羅馬會完成未完的工作，沒有問題，就算我們以 5-0 完成賽事，次回合也會嚴陣以待，羅馬會想盡方法反擊。這仍是一個正面的賽果，表現也相當理想。假若我陣中有任何一位球員認為羅馬已失去爭勝心，那麼他便不會上陣。我們會為所需要的賽果全力而戰。」

「就算在末段失球也好，這班小伙子在整場長時間的演出也是出色。」
希望Daddy喺更衣室開鳩懦夫波喇

「今晚球場的氣氛令人拍案叫絕，跟你領先5球時預期的氣氛一樣。我希望同樣的氣氛能在週末早場延續，這將會是一場重要之戰，我們要預備好全力以赴。」

But Klopp has refused to criticise Lovren and claims Hummels has made ‘bigger mistakes’ than the Liverpool centre-back. ‘We were completely solid in defence.

It happens one time they play a long ball into the box, which we had defended before and was not even a chance,’ said Klopp. Lovren’s error allowed Edin Dzeko to score for Roma.

‘That can happen, it is nothing to do with defending and it’s not about criticism.

‘I know what people say, ‘that’s Dejan Lovren – world-class and then one mistake’, yet all the big ones make mistakes.

‘That happens constantly. Mats Hummels made bigger mistakes, to be honest, and he is a world-class centre-half. It’s not about that.

‘We didn’t give any space away; it was not that we were completely open because we are all offensive and then they had one chance after the other. ‘

It was not like that, we controlled the game in a very nice football way – good to watch, even for me.

‘Now it is not over, that’s why somebody thought, ‘let’s play one leg here and one leg in Rome’. It is more exciting and that’s what we do now.’

【now.com體育】利物浦著名球星謝拉特表示，當今地球最佳球員非穆罕默德沙拿莫屬。

周二利物浦於歐聯4強首回合主場以5:2大勝羅馬，埃及前鋒穆罕默德沙拿（Mohamed Salah）為羅拔圖法明奴及沙迪奧文尼貢獻助攻，個人則梅開二度，本季已累積43個入球，產量更勝美斯及基斯坦奴朗拿度。

前紅軍隊長謝拉特於《BT Sport》為沙拿作出以下評價，「他正處於生涯高峰階段，很難去將他與C朗及美斯作比較，因為後兩者多年來維持頂尖水平。」

「但毫無疑問，沙拿是地球當下最佳球員。」

今仗倒戈的沙拿連續5場為紅軍正選出戰都有士哥，現距離有入場觀戰的名宿魯殊，於1983/84年為紅軍單季入波最多（47球）的紀錄，只餘4球之距。

Liverpool FC can confirm Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain's 2017-18 season is over for both club and country due to a knee ligament injury sustained against AS Roma on Tuesday evening.

The midfielder was forced from the field after 18 minutes of the Reds’ 5-2 victory in the Champions League semi-final first leg at Anfield after picking up the issue during an attempted challenge.

The extent of the injury means Oxlade-Chamberlain is set to miss the remainder of the campaign for Liverpool, as well as the World Cup finals in Russia with England.

The 24-year-old was assessed by the club’s medical team at Melwood on Wednesday morning and no specific timescale is being placed upon his return to action at this stage.

However, Oxlade-Chamberlain will now begin a rehabilitation programme to enable him to reach full fitness again as soon as possible, returning to action next season.
